UniprotID	Q9HC73-3
Accession	Q9HC73;J3QKD1;Q5G7M1;Q9H5R3
EntryName	CRLF2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Cytokine receptor-like factor 2 (Cytokine receptor-like 2) (IL-XR) (Thymic stromal lymphopoietin protein receptor) (TSLP receptor)
GeneName	CRLF2 CRL2 ILXR TSLPR
Length	259
Function	Receptor for thymic stromal lymphopoietin (TSLP). Forms a functional complex with TSLP and IL7R which is capable of stimulating cell proliferation through activation of STAT3 and STAT5. Also activates JAK2 (By similarity). Implicated in the development of the hematopoietic system.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Secreted
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure
